ygData.subject: Re: Singing Strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wouldn t suggest those two things, no, but that misses the point a bit.  When I play my warrior, I will often stop taunting and will sometimes stop
ygData.messageBody:
> ... Would anyone seriously ever suggest a
> ranger only dual-wield for part of a fight? Or that a warrior not use his
> extra attacks for part of a fight? ...
> Kitasi

I wouldn't suggest those two things, no, but that misses the point a bit. When
I play my warrior, I will often stop taunting and will sometimes stop swinging
altogether in order to balance out the damage, and to keep the MOBs spinning.
It's much easier for a party to copy with balanced damage, and a spinning MOB
attacks less, so both are useful.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
